data.title: Cincinnati Children's
data.meta_description: Contact Cincinnati Children's by phone or by filling out our online form. If you are experiencing a medical emergency, call 911.
data.text:
If you are experiencing a medical emergency, call 911 or your local emergency access provider.

For more information or to schedule an appointment:

For general assistance, call 513-636-4200 (local) or 1-800-344-2462 (toll free) or fill out the form below.

To schedule an appointment, call 513-636-3200.

For billing questions, visit the Cincinnati Children’s Online Business Office for a simple and secure way to manage and pay your hospital bills. We also have online billing resources and answers to frequently asked questions.

To refer a patient or consult with our physicians:

Refer a patient or get a second opinion

Consult with one of our physicians

Complete the form below for questions, information or comments

Information sent via email is not secure or confidential. If you would like a response to your comments or questions, include both your email address and telephone number. We cannot process emergency requests through this form. This form cannot be used to schedule appointments.

If you are seeking medical advice:

Contact the child’s primary care physician or bring the child in to be seen at a Cincinnati Children’s urgent care or emergency department facility. If this is an emergency, call 911.

Cincinnati Children’s cannot provide medical advice over the phone or via a web form submitted to us. The Contact Us page is not monitored on a full-time, 24/7 basis.

Fields marked with an asterisk (*) are required.
